attributes.action: instruct the DVLA to make the CBT test a compulsery part of any driving test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is such a good idea for anyone thinking of learning to drive, to actually experience what it is like to ride a two wheeler on the roads when learning, just to open up peoples eyes and be more considerate whilst driving - this can only be helpfull.

Not proposing for a full years experience and full test like in another petition, just the CBT test at little extra cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
